Reason: The configuration option 'gc_warn_threshold_in_ms' is performance-sensitive. This is because the 'GCInspector' class is responsible for managing Garbage Collection (GC) in the system, which directly impacts system performance. The code context provided initializes the GCInspector by querying Garbage Collector MXBeans and registering the GCInspector as an MBean. These operations are time-expensive and memory-expensive, as they involve interacting with the platform MBean server and creating new proxies for GC MXBeans. Therefore, any changes to the 'gc_warn_threshold_in_ms' configuration can lead to notable performance variations at the system level.
